bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a black object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: you should never pick and place a box
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.4: when place a fragile objects, the soft objects must be in the bin
